snippet: Novak Djokovic lost, 7-6 (2), 6-3, to Janko Tipsarevic in the Madrid Open quarterfinals, becoming the latest big name to lose on the new blue-clay court.
abstract: Novak Djokovic is ousted in the men's quarterfinals at the Madrid Open, becoming the latest big name to lose on the tennis tournament's new blue-clay court.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic lost, 7-6 (2), 6-3, to Janko Tipsarevic in the Madrid Open quarterfinals, becoming the latest big name to lose on the new blue-clay court.
